fax_activation_widget-intro:
You are going to create a fax line as part of your pack.
Once you have activated it, you will be sent an email containing the number of the fax line and its login details.
To use your service we recommend the EcoFax software.
fax_activation_widget_free_slot_zero: You no longer have any available services
fax_activation_widget_on_doing: One of more fax lines are being activated.
